channel.title: 0.9.6 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Increased chances of Physician spawning. * Other spawn balancing. * Some optimizations in the custom rooms. * New icons for the Noble & Aristocrat made by @Luxx .
## Aristocrat & Noble: * Maid Spy is now a day ability. * Removed Secret Message. * Added night ability Crier - Send for a crier to deliver a message to the court at the start of the next day.
## Aristocrat: * Added night ability Silence - Select a target that voted guilty on the last trial - Negate their vote the next day
## Hunter: * Wolf Companion now has 2 uses.
## Invoker: * Bewilder now disables the King's abilities.
## King: * Will no longer start bleeding if visiting a trapped Hunter.
## Noble: * No longer has the Noble Twins passive. * Added night ability Order - Select a target that voted guilty on an executed Blue Dragon - Negate their votes the next day
## Ritualist: * Added passive Will of Mithras - If you are sacrificed, the Cult Leader's Eradicate ability will gain an extra charge.
## Seeker: * Expose will now show who the Prince actually imprisons at night.
## Sheriff: * Posse Comitatus removed. * Added night ability Scout. You can have a scout watch a player, letting you know if they get converted. The scout will stay on the player until you command them to watch someone else.
## Bug Fixes: * Ritualist's Strength of Corax did not have 2 uses like the Class Card said. * Healing bleeding should now be fixed. * Some others.

item.title: 0.9.6 Patch Notes

item.description:
Ellie:

Removed Secret Message.
Added night ability Crier - Send for a crier to deliver a message to the court at the start of the next day.

So it’s sent to everyone now instead of a specific player?

Oh and what are the uses on most of these new abilities? They don’t seem to be mentioned anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.6 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
General:

  • Increased chances of Physician spawning.
  • Other spawn balancing.
  • Some optimizations in the custom rooms.
  • New icons for the Noble & Aristocrat made by @Luxx .

Aristocrat & Noble:

  • Maid Spy is now a day ability.
  • Removed Secret Message.
  • Added night ability Crier - Send for a crier to deliver a message to the court at the start of the next day.

Aristocrat:

  • Added night ability Silence - Select a target that voted guilty on the last trial - Negate their vote the next day

Hunter:

  • Wolf Companion now has 2 uses.

Invoker:

  • Bewilder now disables the King’s abilities.

King:

  • Will no longer start bleeding if visiting a trapped Hunter.

Noble:

  • No longer has the Noble Twins passive.
  • Added night ability Order - Select a target that voted guilty on an executed Blue Dragon - Negate their votes the next day

Ritualist:

  • Added passive Will of Mithras - If you are sacrificed, the Cult Leader’s Eradicate ability will gain an extra charge.

Seeker:

  • Expose will now show who the Prince actually imprisons at night.

Sheriff:

  • Posse Comitatus removed.
  • Added night ability Scout. You can have a scout watch a player, letting you know if they get converted. The scout will stay on the player until you command them to watch someone else.

Bug Fixes:

  • Ritualist’s Strength of Corax did not have 2 uses like the Class Card said.
  • Healing bleeding should now be fixed.
  • Some others.

Read full topic
